        Throws:

      • getHbaseTableInfo

        public boolean getHbaseTableInfo(String tblName,
                        int[] tblInfo)
                          throws org.apache.hadoop.hbase.MasterNotRunningException,
                                 IOException,
                                 ClassNotFoundException,
                                 URISyntaxException
        This method returns index levels and block size of Hbase Table. Index level is read from Hfiles trailer block. Randomly selects one region and iterates through all Hfiles in the chosen region and gets the maximum index level. Block size is read from HColumnDescriptor.
        Throws:
        org.apache.hadoop.hbase.MasterNotRunningException
        IOException
        ClassNotFoundException
        URISyntaxException
